title: Budget type workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of a budget type record.

The budget type workflow relies on business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field affected by a business rule during that phase.

Metaphase: Active

Phase Transition Description
Active Manual

The budget type is available for selection.

To make the budget type inactive, manually transition it to the Inactive phase.

Next phase: Inactive

Metaphase: Inactive (End)

Phase Transition Description
Inactive Manual

The budget type isn't available for selection.

To make the budget type active again, manually transition it to the Active phase.

Next phase: None, or return to Active
